TEXT: e1: Of course it would be nice and simple if after a fun night out with a party acquaintance you could simply take the 'morning-after pill' and feel at ease.
CN RELATION: morning-after pill', feel at ease (Causes)/'morning-after pill', nice (HasProperty)/'morning-after pill', simple (HasProperty)/you, take the 'morning-after pill' (CapableOf)/fun night out with a party acquaintance, take the 'morning-after pill' (CausesDesire)/fun night out with a party acquaintance, feel at ease (CausesDesire)/have a fun night out with a party acquaintance, take the 'morning-after pill' (HasLastSubevent)/'morning-after pill', taken (ReceivesAction)/'morning-after pill', feel at ease (UsedFor)

TEXT: e2: But it's not that simple.
e3: Perhaps a new life was already created that night.
e4: I would kill it without further thought.
e5: That's why a visit to the doctor and professional advice should remain mandatory.
CN RELATION: visit to the doctor, mandatory (HasProperty)/professional advice, mandatory (HasProperty)

MISSING INFORMATION 2: When something is mandatory, it is not easy.
MISSING INFORMATION 3: During a fun night, contraception is often forgotten.
